A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I actually signed up to rottentomatotes.com just to leave a review of this movie.  This was a horrible movie from start to finish.  Have no idea what the director was trying to do; but suspect the Empire paid him to infiltrate the Star Wars movie to sabotage it from within.  Seeing Carrie Fisher on screen one last time is the only reason for anyone to see this movie; and I don't think she would mind you waiting till it was in the comfort of your own home and you could fast forward through all the crud to catch her on screen.  
  I have to believe that the critics that gave this a positive review know nothing about the history of these films or just did not bother actually seeing the film before writing the reviews.  
  The pacing and directing was horrible.  The music just never seemed to match what was on the screen.  The storyline was clichéd and just made no sense in places.  Some of the performances were good\, but even those seemed to be under duress at times.  
  I am sure most that truly wanted to see this movie already have; but for anyone just considering it\, DON'T...
